question: Which water body is geographically related to Cameroon?
explanation: Cameroon is geographically related to the Bight of Bonny. The Bight of Bonny is also known as the Bight of Biafra. It lies to the south and south-west of Cameroon. It forms one of the two parts of the Gulf of Guinea of the Atlantic Ocean. Bight of Benin forms the other part.
